description:
RepairLog is your ultimate companion for keeping every repair and maintenance task in order. Whether it’s fixing a leaky faucet, painting a room, or replacing a window, the app helps you log every detail - from what was repaired to when, how much it cost, and who did the work. You can organize repairs by rooms or areas, attach notes and always have your home’s maintenance history at hand.

Planning future repairs is just as easy - simply set a date and RepairLog will remind you before the time comes, so you never forget an important task. You can also track your total spending and view clear statistics to understand where your budget goes. With a clean and intuitive interface, RepairLog makes it simple to stay on top of home care, reduce stress, and keep your space in perfect shape all year round.

About Auto-Renewable Subscriptions

Subscriptions are automatically charged each billing period, whether monthly or another period, and you may be charged no more than 24 hours before the beginning of each billing period.
- Cancellation: You may cancel a subscription at any time more than 24 hours before your renewal date.

Listen AI: Unveiling the Power of Text-to-Speech

Turn Text into Speech and Open Your Ears to the Written Word

Listen AI isn't just a text-to-speech tool, it's your effortless companion for a world of information, narrated at your pace. Here's how Listen AI elevates your experience:

Unmatched Vocal Majesty: Immerse yourself in a variety of crystal-clear, expressive voices that blur the line between human and machine. Choose from a range of accents and personalities to find the perfect narrator for any content, be it a casual blog post or a formal report.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Tailor your listening experience to your preferences. Adjust the speaking rate to match your comprehension speed, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.

Effortless Integration: Forget copy-pasting. Listen AI seamlessly converts text from documents and web pages into spoken content. Highlight a passage on a website, a section in a PDF, or an entire document, and Listen AI will bring it to life with its captivating narration.

Multitasking Masterclass: Free up your eyes and ears for other activities. Listen to articles, web pages, and PDFs while you exercise, commute, cook, or complete chores. Listen AI lets you learn and stay informed while you conquer your to-do list.

Accessibility Champion: Listen AI is a game-changer for those with visual impairments or learning disabilities. Reading lengthy documents or educational materials can be a challenge. Listen AI transforms text into an engaging audio experience, making learning and information access more accessible than ever before.

Listen AI: It's not just reading, it's experiencing.

Terms and Conditions: https://static.listenai.app/terms-conditions-en.html
Privacy Policy: https://static.listenai.app/privacy-en.html
Community Guidelines: https://static.listenai.app/community-guidelines-en.html

app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

Silenza – Your Daily Moment of Stillness 
Find peace in silence.
Silenza invites you to pause for just one minute each day — no movement, no sound, no distractions.
If you stay completely still and silent, you’ll unlock a new serene illustration from the World of Calm collection.
 
Each day adds to your streak and opens a new piece of tranquil beauty — a quiet motivation to return, breathe, and simply be.
 
Key Features:
• 60-second “moment of silence” sessions
• Motion, sound, and touch detection for full mindfulness immersion
• Daily streak tracker to keep your calm routine
• Unlockable collection of peaceful illustrations
• Minimalist, atmospheric design
• Gentle animations and sounds for inner balance
 
Embrace silence. Discover stillness. Unlock peace with Silenza.

The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

“Great app, excellent journalism! The Economist is wonderful. The content is interesting and relevant and the reporting is superlative. Equally impressive is the drive to stay relevant by presenting media in multiple formats, from print to podcasts and short videos.”

“Impeccable journalism with an app to match. The Economist doesn’t need my endorsement of the quality of their journalism. It speaks for itself. Rather, I’ll comment that their app is well-designed and refreshing to use…I love being able to easily download entire editions, listen to articles with real narrators and search for past articles.”

Full terms of use: https://www.economist.com/legal/terms-of-use
Our privacy policy: https://www.economist.com/privacy

Subscribe to the National Geographic Traveller (UK) app to enjoy all of the award-winning content from our print magazine on your iPad or iPhone. 

National Geographic Traveller (UK) is here to inspire readers to get up and go with compelling storytelling, ‘you-are-there’ photography and insightful, reader-friendly information. It is passionate about experiencing the world, celebrates journeys about place and culture, and features outstanding photography.  For those who love all that is travel – this is a new adventure…  

INSIDE

Smart Traveller: Like a local, Eat and Sleep (accommodation). 
Destinations: Europe and worldwide.
City guides and long weekend ideas.
Practical features: Ask the experts about travel dilemmas; the burning issues, survivors guides and top tips. 
Real life experiences: From volunteering to educational tours or travel by rail.
Plus great competitions.

This is a free app download. Within the app users can purchase the current issue and back issues.

Subscriptions are also available within the application. A subscription will start from the latest regular issue at the time of purchase.

-The subscription will renew automatically unless cancelled more than 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, for the same duration and at the current subscription rate for the product.
-You may turn off the auto-renewal of subscriptions through your Account Settings, however you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period.
-Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when a subscription to that publication is purchased.
-If a subscription offers a free trial, at the end of the trial period, you will be charged the full price of the subscription. You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription settings on your iTunes account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the subscription period to avoid being charged.

Users can register for/ login to a pocketmags account in-app. This will protect their issues in the case of a lost device and allow browsing of purchases on multiple platforms. Existing pocketmags users can retrieve their purchases by logging into their account.

We recommend loading the app for the first time in a wi-fi area so that all issue data is retrieved.
If your app will not load past the splash page after a first install or an update, please delete and reinstall the app from the App Store

Help and frequently asked questions can be accessed in-app and on pocketmags.

If you have any problems at all please do not hesitate to contact us: help@pocketmags.com

Apakabar.fm helps you not just learn a language but start using it.

It offers short, engaging texts in dozens of languages — easy to read and listen to. Every text is fully voiced, so you can repeat, practice pronunciation, and improve listening skills.

An interactive map lets you explore texts tied to real places.

New reading and listening materials appear every eight hours.

Discover the joy of reading with Magibook - the app that changes books to match your reading level. Perfect for beginners, English learners, parents, children, and anyone who wants to enjoy books more easily.

What Magibook Offers:

•Makes Books Easier: Every book comes in four reading levels.
•Lots of Books: Read many different books, from philosophy to literary classics.
•Helps You Learn English: Great for ESL, EFL, IELTS, and TOEFL
•Good for Kids: Many valuable books can now readable by children.
•Special features for dyslexia, ADHD, and other reading challenges
•Easy-to-Use Dictionary: Learn new words as you read.
•See Your Progress: Watch how your reading gets better over time. 

For English Learners: 
Improve your English through reading. Start easy and progress to harder books. Boost vocabulary, grammar, and comprehension with famous books in simpler language. Great for IELTS and TOEFL preparation.

For Parents: 
Help your children love reading with age-appropriate books that grow with them. Improve literacy and develop a lifelong passion for literature.

For Everyone: 
We make difficult books simpler, so everyone can enjoy great literature regardless of reading challenges. Perfect for those with dyslexia or ADHD.

Why Choose Magibook?

•Personalized reading experience
•Encourages lifelong reading habits
•Improves English skills for ESL/EFL learners
•Supports special education needs
•Makes classic literature accessible
•Aids in exam preparation
•Provides graded readers for improvement
•Offers abridged versions of complex texts
•Enhances vocabulary and grammar
•Improves reading comprehension and speed 

Available Books: Magibook offers a wide range of famous books at different reading levels, including:

"Don Quixote" by Miguel de Cervantes, "War and Peace" by Leo Tolstoy, "Pride and Prejudice" by Jane Austen, "Les Miserables" by Victor Hugo, "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald, "Crime and Punishment" by Fyodor Dostoevsky, "Moby Dick" by Herman Melville, "The Republic" by Plato, "Wealth of Nations" by Adam Smith, "The Ethics of Aristotle" by Aristotle, "Jane Eyre" by Charlotte Brontë, "Ulysses" by James Joyce, "Great Expectations" by Charles Dickens, "The Brothers Karamazov" by Fyodor Dostoevsky, "The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin" by Benjamin Franklin, "On Liberty" by John Stuart Mill, "The Count of Monte Cristo" by Alexandre Dumas, "Meditations" by Marcus Aurelius, "The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes" by Arthur Conan Doyle, "Kim" by Rudyard Kipling.

From philosophy to adventures, from romances to mysteries, Magibook brings you the best books in a way you can enjoy.

With Magibook, you can:

•Read classic novels at your level
•Improve English vocabulary and grammar
•Prepare for language tests
•Help children develop reading skills
•Make reading easier with dyslexia or ADHD
•Explore philosophy and complex ideas
•Enjoy literature in simplified English
•Track reading progress
•Use an integrated dictionary
•Find books matching your reading level 

Suitable for all language levels: A1 (Beginner), A2 (Elementary), B1, B2(intermediate), C1 (advanced), or C2 (proficiency).

Don't let difficult books hold you back. With Magibook, you can read anything. From beginner level to advanced literature, from children's stories to philosophical works. It's like having a reading tutor, dictionary, and vast library in one app.

Upgrade to Magibook Unlimited - our premium subscription giving you unlimited access to our entire digital book library and premium features, plus be first to access new book releases and reading tools as they launch. Not ready to subscribe? Try Magibook with our selection of free classic books.

Unlock your reading potential with Magibook - where every book is the right book for you.

Our mission is to increase accessibility to knowledge, understanding, and shared wisdom.

Install Magibook today, for free!

Сканворды на русском языке без всяких сомнений уникальное явление в мире. Ни на каком другом языке вы не найдете столько литературных вопросов, вопросов с юмором, вопросов с контекстом происходящего в мире сегодня. И всё это в обычных кроссвордах, хотя, казалось бы, какая ерунда. Русский народ – народ слова. И любит своё слово, и держит своё слово, и относится к слову как к самому дорогому.

Сканворды в приложении разнообразные - попроще и посложнее, с фотографиями, с классическими вопросами или ассоциативными: «одним словом» либо «раз слово, два слово», как подсказки старца Фура. В любом журнале есть один англо-русский сканворд и один «дыркавнос», надеюсь, вы поймёте, почему его так назвали. На каждой странице вас встречает персонаж нашей весёлой семейки. Присоединяйтесь!

Все сканворды для читателя бесплатны. Это годовая коллекция: 52-53 номера по 20 сканвордов в каждом. Полный годовой арсенал сканвордов «съест» на телефоне около 50 Мбайт - картинки маленькие, текст - это текст. Мы ценим место на вашем телефоне.

Интернет для разгадывания не нужен. При условии, что сами сканворды уже на вашем телефоне. Каждую пятницу выходит новый номер журнала. Если вы оставили активной опцию «уведомление», то один раз в неделю в пятницу в 12-00 по местному времени придёт напоминание о новом номере. При входе в приложение загрузка нового журнала происходит автоматически и при её успешном завершении более не повторяется. Кроме того, можно загрузить или удалить на телефон поштучно любой из журналов, либо через «Настройки» скачать все журналы в один клик.

Основные возможности, в том числе доступ ко всем сканвордам, в приложении для читателя бесплатны. Банкет оплачивает рекламодатель. Ему разрешено иметь один узкий баннер на каждой странице + один показ межстраничной рекламы перед открытием сканворда. Наш рекламодатель не прерывает процесс разгадывания. Также рекламодатель щедро награждает читателя бесплатными подсказками за просмотр своих роликов. 

Любой читатель вправе, но не обязан, «перебить» рекламодателя, и: а) отключить рекламу навсегда, б) оформить подписку, которая на срок подписки отключает рекламу и даёт неограниченные подсказки, в) набрать подсказок на развес. Все эти возможности представлены на витрине в «Магазине».

Подписка - стандартный механизм Apple. 
1) Подписка возможна на три срока - неделя, месяц или год.
2) Подписка автоматически продлеваемая. Средства за возобновление подписки будут взиматься в течение 24 часов до конца текущего периода. 
3) Подписка подключается или отключается стандартно через iTunes, ссылка управления внизу. При желании отказаться от возобновления подписки пользователю необходимо это сделать не позднее, чем за 24 часа до конца текущего периода. При этом оплаченный период подписки отработает до конца. 

Политика конфиденциальности https://scanword.ru/privacy.html
Условия пользования https://scanword.ru/terms.html
Управление подпиской https://support.apple.com/ru-ru/HT202039

Inkitt Brings Stories to Life

Join Inkitt for the Community 
Dive into Inkitt, where stories, books, and novels come to life in a global community of readers and writers. Our readers are the trendsetters. Every day, millions of readers come to Inkitt to discover the next bestseller. Get feedback on your work, share your favorite science fiction or adventure stories, and explore a treasure trove of fantasy and romance novels. 

Unlimited Reading, A Library of Indie Novels Awaits
Enjoy unlimited reading across genres you love. From steamy romance to thrilling adventure, or captivating fantasy to provocative romance, there’s something for everyone:
Discover indie novels from promising writers
Explore a new niche like mafia romances, fantasy adventures, or your favorite fanfiction
Download books to read offline anytime
Personalize your experience with customizable fonts and colors

Peech – Turn Anything Into Audiobooks!

Meet Peech, your personal AI-powered reading sidekick that transforms all your text - PDFs, web articles, physical books, and more - into crystal-clear audiobooks. Whether you’re racing through study notes, catching up on blog posts, or diving into that spicy new novel, Peech has you covered.

The Magic of AI Voices
	• Smart Voice Matching: Peech’s advanced AI picks the perfect voice for each genre - whether it’s serious academic reading or a lighthearted romance.
	• Natural & Lifelike: Our voices are so real, you might forget you’re listening to an app.

Effortless Content Scanning
	• Lightning-Fast OCR: Snap a pic of any page or book, and Peech instantly converts it to audio. No more manual typing!
	• Web & PDF Parsing: Just paste a link or upload a file to start listening - perfect for busy pros, students, and anyone who prefers ears over eyes.

Speedy Reading, On-the-Go
	• High-Speed Playback: Devour your favorite content up to 5x faster - perfect for power-learners or those who want to binge-listen on the run.
	• Playlists & Autoplay: Build custom playlists to keep the stories rolling, so you can multitask like a boss.

One App, All Languages
	• Automatic Language Detection: Peech seamlessly identifies and narrates in 60+ languages.
	• Global Accessibility: Great for language learners, busy professionals, and anyone with reading challenges.

Why Peech?
	• Students: Turn textbooks into engaging audio lectures - study smarter, not harder.
	• Busy Professionals: Catch up on news, memos, or trade articles during your commute.
	• Accessibility: An empowering reading solution for users with visual or reading impairments.
	• Content Lovers: From classics to your favorite steamy novels - Peech reads it all.

Free Trials & Subscriptions

Experience Peech with our flexible subscription plans, some offering free trials. Dive into unlimited content and see how Peech revolutionizes your reading routine - no commitment, no hassle.

Ready to transform your reading life? Give Peech a try and unlock the power of AI-driven audio today!

"Zemgales Ziņas" ir uzticams reģionālais medijs, kas jau vairāk nekā 30 gadus informē par svarīgākajiem notikumiem Zemgalē. Tagad pieejams arī mobilajā lietotnē, lai Tu vienmēr būtu informēts par:

Vietējām ziņām – aktuālie notikumi Tavā novadā un pilsētā.

Kultūras un izklaides pasākumiem – koncerti, izstādes, festivāli.

Sporta jaunumiem – vietējo komandu spēles un sasniegumi.

Uzņēmējdarbības aktualitātēm – intervijas ar uzņēmējiem, biznesa vides analīze.

Dzīvesstila padomiem – receptes, mājas un dārza ieteikumi.

Sludinājumiem un paziņojumiem – darba piedāvājumi, apsveikumi, līdzjūtības.

Lietotnes galvenās funkcijas:

E-avīzes lasīšana – piekļuve pilnam laikraksta saturam digitālā formātā.

Ziņu arhīvs – iespēja pārlūkot iepriekšējos izdevumus.

Pielāgots dizains – ērta un pārskatāma saskarne lasīšanai mobilajā ierīcē.

Paziņojumi – saņem brīdinājumus par svarīgākajām ziņām.

Bezsaistes režīms – lejupielādē rakstus un lasi tos arī bez interneta savienojuma.

Par laikrakstu:

Nerdish is a self-education app for adults who aim to learn and know more about the world. Read concise and engaging articles with insights on topics related to science, history, arts, society, technology, famous people, food, daily things and other fields of general knowledge. Nerdish helps you learn something new every day with quick 5–10 minute reads.

Nerdish offers:
- Short, science-based, and inspiring learning articles across categories like Art and Culture, History, Science, Technology, Psychology, Health, Politics, and Society.
- All content is designed for self-education on the go — brief, fact-checked, well-structured, and perfect for curious minds who love learning.
- Get maximum knowledge in minimum time with quick daily reads that make education simple, engaging, and fun.

The articles featured in Nerdish are short, science-based, and easy to read — yet far from being just collections of random facts.
Each topic delivers essential knowledge in a clear, structured way, helping you learn the basics of science, history, art, and more in just minutes.
Key ideas across different articles are logically connected, creating a deeper understanding of the world and helping knowledge stick.
Nerdish makes self-education simple and inspiring — combining learning, discovery, and personal growth in every read.

Nerdish is a perfect match for those who:
- Love learning and discovering new facts every day.
- Enjoy reading short, engaging, and educational articles.
- Are curious about the world and excited to expand their general knowledge.
- Love nonfiction books and smart, inspiring reads.
- Enjoy finding new ideas and connections between things they already know.

Nerdish is a new way to approach lifelong learning and self-development.
The world around us is constantly changing, and expanding your knowledge helps you stay inspired, think creatively, and adapt with ease. At work, on a date, or at a party — it always feels good to be the one who knows a bit more. With Nerdish, you can keep learning every day and become that curious, confident, and well-informed person everyone loves to talk to.

Learn with us about: 
- History and civilization: ancient empires, great discoveries, revolutions, and remarkable people who changed the world.
- Science and nature: the human body, space, evolution, physics, and everyday phenomena explained simply.
- Art and culture: painting, music, architecture, design, literature, and creative movements.
- Psychology and society: emotions, thinking, habits, communication, and social change.
- Technology and innovation: AI, inventions, space exploration, and the tools that shape modern life.
- Daily life and fun facts: why the sky is blue, how coffee was discovered, or where common ideas come from.

Nerdish is making popular science more popular.
